name: VineMaze Chapter 1
description:
I Strongly Recommend To Play Game At Either Medium Or Higher Settings...

Low And Very Low Settings Will Give Very Bad Experience As Game Becomes Too Dark To See...

This Game Was Created By Using Unity3D 

Engine In Just 9 Weeks By A Single Person
Only.

Minor Bugs Or Glitches May Be Present
But No GameBreaking Bugs.

The Game Doesn't Have Any Load/Save System.If A Player Dies He Must Start From The Begining...

DM Me Guys And Tell Me Whether You Are Able To Solve Puzzle Or Not😁

Follow Me On Instagram And Subscribe Me On Youtube...

https://www.instagram.com/vinegamestudios/

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2nGdn0m3gxnwYqxuoDlqJw
